public class Base extends Object

    • placeAllTargetRandomly

      public void placeAllTargetRandomly()
      Creates and place all targets randomly on the base larger before small buildings before tanks and oil drums

    • randomPlacement

      private void randomPlacement(Target target)
      helper method to randomly generate the location and orientation of the target place the target if the orientation and location are legal
      参数:
      given - target that's waited to be placed

    • okToPlaceTargetAt

      public boolean okToPlaceTargetAt(Target target, int row, int column, boolean horizontal)
      returns true if it is OK to put the target with its head at this location, false otherwise
      参数:
      given - target
      given - row
      given - column
      given - orientation, whether it is horizontal or not
      返回:

    • placeTargetAt

      public void placeTargetAt(Target target, int row, int column, boolean horizontal)
      sets the value of the "hit" array, "coordinate" array and "horizontal" boolean value of the target
      参数:
      given - target
      given - row
      given - column
      given - orientation, whether it is horizontal

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied(int row, int column)
      Returns true if the given location contains a Target; Returns false if it does not.
      参数:
      row -
      column -
      返回:
      true or false

      Attack the position specified by the row and the column.
      参数:

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver(Weapon weapon1, Weapon weapon2)
      Returns true if run out of ammunition or Returns true if all targets have been destroyed; otherwise, return false.
      参数:
      weapon1 -
      weapon2 -
      返回:
      true or false

    • win

      public boolean win()
      Returns true if all targets have been destroyed.
      返回:
      true or false

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the Base. row/column numbers should be displayed too “O”: Used to indicate a location that you have fired upon and hit a target “-”: Used to indicate a location that you have fired upon and found nothing there “X”: Used to indicate a location containing a destroyed Target ‘.’: Used to indicate a location that you have never fired upon “T”: Used to indicate an undestroyed but hit Tank

    • incrementShotsCount

      public void incrementShotsCount()
      This method will be called from shootAt(int row, int column) from Weapon class.

    • getShotsCount

      public int getShotsCount()
      返回:
      The total number of shots fired by the user.

      返回:
